storage
Class UrlContent

java.lang.Object
  storage.UrlContent
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
@Entity
public class UrlContent
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Encapsulation of URL, content and crawl date of a registered user for storage in the BDB instance

Version:
20130410
Author:
Michael Collis (mcollis@seas.upenn.edu)
See Also:
Serialized Form

Set the HTTP Status line returned last time the page was crawled

Parameters:
inputStatus - First line of the response to the HTTP request that retrieved the page

getStatus

public int getStatus()
Retrieve the HTTP status code returned last time the page was crawled

Returns:
HTTP status code if the status line has been initialized and the code is well-formed; else, returns -1

getContentType

public java.lang.String getContentType()
Returns the content type of the page

Returns:

getLastModified

public java.lang.String getLastModified()
Retrieve the time the page was last modified from the resource's headers

Returns:
Standard UNIX long integer representation of the time the resource was last modified, if a "Last-Modified" header was retrieved; else, returns null

getContentLength

public long getContentLength()
Retrieve the character length of the resource content

Returns:
Length in UTF-8 characters of the resource content if a "Content-Length" header was retrieved, and is well-formed; else, returns -1

getRedirect

public java.lang.String getRedirect()
Returns the URL indicated by the "Location" header if the page sent a redirect request

Returns:
Redirected destination URL, if a "Location" header was retrieved; else, returns null

conformingMimeType

public boolean conformingMimeType()
Check if the resource is of a MIME type want to crawl (HTML, XML, XHTML, and PDF)

Returns:
True if the "Content-Type" header has been retrieved and the MIME type matches the crawler requirements; else, returns false

isXML

public boolean isXML()
Checks if the resource is an XML file

Returns:
True if the "Content-Type" header has been retrieved and the MIME type is one of the XML variants; else, returns false

hasChunkedEncoding

public boolean hasChunkedEncoding()
Checks if the resource's host sent the file with chunked encoding

Returns:
True if the "Transfer-Encoding" header has been retrieved and value is "Chunked"; else, returns false

requiresHSTS

public boolean requiresHSTS()
Checks if the resource's host requires the use of HTTP Strict Transport Security to retrieve the resource

Returns:
True if the "Strict-Transport-Security" header has been retrieved; else, returns false

isKeepAlive

public boolean isKeepAlive()
Checks if the resource's host sent the file with "Connection: keep-alive" header

Returns:
True if the "Connection" header has been retrieved and value is "keep-alive"; else, returns false
